name: SaaS Founder - Cold Email Pain
description: For B2B SaaS founders struggling with cold email / outbound

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

Quick question: is {company}'s outbound working as well as you'd like?

I ask because I run an AI-powered outbound system that's booking 5-10 meetings/month for SaaS founders like you — at a fraction of what agencies charge.

We handle everything: research, personalization, sending, follow-ups. You just take the calls.

Worth 15 minutes to see if it makes sense for {company}?

Caesar
Founder, Caesar's Legions
sequence.notes: Opens with question to get engagement. Short, direct, clear CTA.

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

Just wanted to bump this up — know your inbox is probably crazy.

Quick version: we do your cold email for you. 100 personalized emails/week. Clients typically see 5-10 meetings booked monthly.

Interested in seeing how it works?

Caesar
sequence.notes: Shorter, acknowledges they're busy, restates value.

sequence.body_template:
{firstName},

Don't want to be annoying, so this is my last email.

If {company}'s outbound is a priority, I'd love to show you how we're helping SaaS founders book more meetings without hiring SDRs.

If not, no worries — I'll assume timing isn't right and close your file.

Either way, appreciate your time.

sequence.notes: Breakup email. Creates urgency without being pushy. High reply rate because people respond to 'closing file'.
